model

Class Sport

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Sport
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SportEven

    public class Sport
extends java.lang.Object
    The Sport class represents a sport. All sports have a name (String) and a a minimum number of players to be able to play (int). It also has a list of registered students. Initially this list is empty.

    • Constructor Summary

      Construct a new Sport whith name and minPlayers.
